Get Involved Year-Round                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                                                Get Involved Year-Round   Career Fairs    Participate in our fall and spring career fairs for an interactive way to reach a broad cross section of students.    Registration is now open for the NYU Stern Spring 2014 MBA Career Fair! The fair will take place on Tuesday March 25, 2014. You can register in the Stern Recruitment System under the "Events" tab. Please contact recruit@stern.nyu.edu if you have any further questions.     Partner with Clubs    Work with Stern's 40 MBA student clubs to reach targeted groups of students segmented by academic discipline, global region, community affiliation or social interests.                                       Log in to the Stern Recruiting System:     Username:  Password:         Forgot password?   New recruiter? The deadlines for Fall 2016 will be announced by early summer.             Click to expand and learn more.                                              Stern Application Deadlines                                                       Deadline      Initial Notification* By              1st Deadline      October 15, 2014      December 15, 2014              2nd Deadline      November 15, 2014      February 15, 2015              3rd Deadline      January 15, 2015      April 1, 2015              4th Deadline      March 15, 2015      June 1, 2015              * You will receive one of three initial notifications: invitation to interview, waitlist offer or denial of admission.                Online applications must be submitted by 11:59 p.m. U.S. Eastern Time on the day of the deadline. Any mailed application material must be postmarked by the deadline date.     International Applicants  You are encouraged to apply by the November 15 deadline to facilitate visa arrangements and to have priority consideration for off-site interviews, if desired. You may also apply for any other deadline.     Incomplete Applications  If your application is not complete (for example, missing test scores, essays or other items, illegible scanned transcript) you will be informed via email. If you do not provide a completed application by the deadline, we cannot guarantee notification by the initial notification date.                                   Consortium Application Deadlines                                                       Deadline      Initial Notification* By      Special Notes              Consortium 1st Deadline      October 15, 2014 1      December 15, 2014      Applications must be submitted directly to The Consortium ( Learn more )              Consortium 2nd Deadline      January 5, 2015 1      April 1, 2015                   * You will receive one of three initial notifications: invitation to interview, waitlist offer or denial of admission.      1 JD/MBA,MBA/MFA, MD/MBA, MS in Mathematics/MBA, MS in Biology/MBA, MBA/MA in Politics and MBA/MA in French Studies applicants may not apply to Stern through The Consortium. MBA/MPA applicants who wish to apply through The Consortium should apply by January 5, 2015. MBA/MPA applications will be reviewed after this deadline.               Incomplete Applications  If your application is not complete, you will be informed by The Consortium. If you do not provide a complete application to The Consortium by the deadline, we cannot guarantee notification by the initial notification date.                                   Dual Degree Application Deadlines                                                         Deadline      Initial Notification* By      Special Notes              JD/MBA (Joint Application)      February 15, 2015 1      April 30, 2015                   MBA/MFA      December 15, 2014 1      April 1, 2015      Submit MFA application to NYU Tisch (Kanbar) by December 1              MBA/MPA (Joint Application)      January 5, 2015      April 1, 2015                   MD/MBA      December 15, 2014 1      April 1, 2015      Only current third year full-time NYU School of Medicine students are eligible to apply              MS in Mathematics in Finance/MBA      February 15, 2015 1      April 30, 2015      Only current Courant students are eligible to apply              MS in Biology/MBA      December 15, 2014      April 1, 2015      Submit MS application to Biology program by the corresponding deadline              MBA/MA in Politics      December 15, 2014      April 1, 2015      Submit MA application to Politics program by the corresponding deadline              MBA/MA in French Studies      December 15, 2014      April 1, 2015      Submit MA application to French Studies program by the corresponding deadline              * You will receive one of three initial notifications: invitation to interview, waitlist offer or denial of admission.      1 JD/MBA,MBA/MFA, MD/MBA, MS in Mathematics/MBA, MS in Biology/MBA, MBA/MA in Politics and MBA/MA in French Studies applicants may not apply to Stern through The Consortium.                Online applications must be submitted by 11:59 p.m. U.S. Eastern Time on the day of the deadline. Any mailed application material must be postmarked by the deadline date.     International Applicants  You are encouraged to apply by November 15 to facilitate visa arrangements and to have priority consideration for off-site interviews, if desired.     Incomplete Applications  If your application is not complete (for example, missing test scores, essays or other items, illegible scanned transcript) you will be informed via email. If you do not provide a complete application by the deadline, we cannot guarantee notification by the initial notification date.
